.. currentmodule:: wx.lib.agw.persist.persist_handlers

.. highlight:: python



.. _wx.lib.agw.persist.persist_handlers.MediaCtrlHandler:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.lib.agw.persist.persist_handlers.MediaCtrlHandler**
==========================================================================================================================================

Supports saving/restoring a :class:`media.MediaCtrl` movie position, volume and playback
rate.

This class handles the following wxPython widgets:

- :class:`media.MediaCtrl`.



|

|api| Class API
===============


.. class:: MediaCtrlHandler(AbstractHandler)

   Supports saving/restoring a :class:`media.MediaCtrl` movie position, volume and playback
   rate.
   
   This class handles the following wxPython widgets:
   
   - :class:`media.MediaCtrl`.
